title: Honor level stuck
body: Hello my friends has get like 2-4 honor every game and he is stuck at honor lvl 2 is there anyway to track it or see it some how{{champion:1}}

replies.body: there is no way to track it, they just level up if you receive a lot of honor.
He is honor lvl2 3/3 for month and a half and cant get honor lvl3 2-4 honors every game
Honours/game don't matter much. What matters the most is not getting validly reported.
Incorrect. It levels up as you display non-negative patterns of behaviour. And is _slightly_ sped up if you receive a lot of honour.
Oh really i didnt know that
Play a lot, be nice to people, and say gj whenever people do well. Do not say anything negative. I follow these rules and I get honor 5 every season.
